title: Atoms and Molecules
description: Introduction to the basic principles of the atomic, molecular, and sub-atomic behavior of matter, and applications of these principles in modern society. Electricity and magnetism, electrical nature of matter, organic and inorganic chemistry, modern physics, the nucleus. 3 lectures, 1 laboratory.
prerequisites: PSC 101 or PHYS 121 or PHYS 131 or PHYS 141
